bibl.title: Environment, Health and Disease in Alexandria and the Nile Delta.

series.title: Centre for Hellenic Studies. King's College London. Publications.

bibl.note: From before the foundation of the city to the present day. - [Introduction.] - Patterns of health and disease in Alexandria and the Nile Delta. - Plague. - Cholera. - Smallpox. - Schistosomiasis. - Environmental changes and their potential impact on Alexandria. - References.
